title: REQ: Integrate zmodem support
author: nelgin
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

LePutty has integrated zmodem support so files can be transferred using the serial mechanism over ssh. This is important in our environment since otherwise we had to jump through 3 servers to get a file to a customer's box, whereas with this, it will use an already authenticated, secure channel.

mRemoteNG is already an approved application and it's like pulling teeth to get a new one approved.
